description: ivory pendant with light tan patina; cap at narrow end has large three-dimensional end piece with two rounded elements on rectangular "base", with dots and lines hammered on reverse; three bands of twisted wires on cap at narrow end, two on cap at wider end; hinged cover with knob finial; ivory carved with convex bands and zigzag band
dimension:
2 5/16 x 13 1/8 x 2 1/8 in. (5.87 x 33.34 x 5.4 cm) (without chain)
34 in. (86.36 cm) (object part, chain length)
title: Pendant with chain
